parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPAS system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn or lock up, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The power steering assist fault warning light is illuminated
the steering wheel feels heavy or difficult to turn
the steering wheel locks up
the vehicle is difficult to maneuver
and the power steering assist fault message is displayed on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping and hesitation can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or hesitate, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when merging onto highways or intersections.
symptoms: The transmission slips or hesitates
causing the vehicle to lose power
stall
or hesitate
often accompanied by unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration can cause the vehicle to accelerate suddenly, leading to accidents or loss of control, especially when the vehicle is in motion.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly
often without warning
and may not respond to braking or shifting into neutral.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure and stalling can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or hesitate, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when merging onto highways or intersections.
symptoms: The transmission fails or stalls
causing the vehicle to lose power
stall
or hesitate
often accompanied by unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The PTU failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or hesitate, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when merging onto highways or intersections.
symptoms: The PTU fails
causing the vehicle to lose power
stall
or hesitate
often accompanied by unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal to stop the vehicle can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal sticks to the floor
the brake pedal does not return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The grinding noise and vibration can distract the driver, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Grinding noise when braking
vibration in the brake pedal
noise is more prevalent in cold weather or when moisture is present.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rear brake lockup and drag can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents.
symptoms: Rear brake noise
grinding sound
rear brake pads and rotors are ruined
brake pads and rotors need to be replaced frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS and traction control systems can lead to loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: ABS and traction control lights on
poor control on snowy roads
vehicle surges forward when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Water Pump Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to catastrophic engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine overheats
the temperature gauge moves to hot
the coolant leaks into the crankcase
and the engine oil becomes contaminated with coolant.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling and surging can cause loss of power, loss of control, and accidents, especially on highways.
symptoms: The engine stalls or surges without warning
the vehicle loses power
and the driver may experience difficulty restarting the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of fuel injectors can cause engine misfires, loss of power, and accidents, especially on highways.
symptoms: The engine misfires
the check engine light illuminates
and the vehicle may experience difficulty starting or running rough.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the turbocharger can cause engine failure, loss of power, and accidents, especially on highways.
symptoms: The engine loses power
the turbocharger makes a loud whining noise
and the vehicle may experience difficulty starting or running rough.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The oil leaks can cause engine fires, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The oil leaks from the turbocharger or engine
the engine overheats
and the vehicle may experience difficulty starting or running rough.
